details.point: Contribute to team's Particle Filter, Holonomic Time Optimized Autonomous Path Planner, and Yearly Robot Control Software.
Enhance robot capabilities, navigation, and autonomous capabilities by utilizing computer vision and environmental sensors (color, beam break, optical, etc.)
Direct development and maintainance of scouting application to efficiently collect and insightfully visualize high volumes of competition data.
Contribute to universally used FRC tools: TheBlueAlliance, a global competition data aggregation and insight platform, and WPILIB, the comprehensive Java framework for robot development and control.
Lead subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of team robot and train new members to contribute to robot development.
4th ranked team in California, 12th out of 9000+ total teams; World Championship Division and Double California Regional Event Winning Team in 2024.
Highly selective 4 week UCLA Neurology and AI Summer Program (<4.6% acceptance rate.)
Started program without any prior knowledge, created and optimized numerous architectures (Synaptic Integration, MLPs, CNNs, AlexNet, VAEs, RL Model) for given use cases.

Rapidly developed comprehensive understanding of fundamenal machine learning principles: transformers, recurrent networks, advanced regression, reinforcement learning, convolutional models, advanced training optimization.
